newsitem.title: USA: USDA seeks 1.69 mln lbs frozen hams for lunches.
newsitem.headline: USDA seeks 1.69 mln lbs frozen hams for lunches.

text.p: The Agricultural Marketing Service (AMS) of the U.S. Department of Agriculture said it was seeking to buy 1,692,000 lbs of frozen smoked fully cooked hams (Type II) for use in the National School Lunch Program.frozen

All offers must be in the format prescribed in LS-50 and be received by 1400 EST in Washington, D.C., on Monday, November 18, 1996. Acceptances will be announced by midnight Friday, November 22, 1996.
Shipments must be made between December 28, 1996, and January 10, 1997, it said.
